ShortDescription.Value: A mod that changes stations to match the district Name

Publish.LongDescription:
## Description
This mod will autoname public transport stations to be name of the District where it is placed. This mod also changes the platforms names, therefore in the route information it will actually show which train station (or whatever kind).
This is useful to have
## Usage
- Add a District - Add your station
Old stations will only be updated if there is an extension in the platforms (like in the train stations).
It works for: Bus stations (not signs or shelthers), Train Station, Cargo Train Terminal, Overground Subway Station, Underground Subway Station, Harbor, Cargo Harbor, Airport and International Airport.
## Custom Format
Edit the file and change the format of the stations:
``` %AppData%\..\LocalLow\Colossal Order\Cities Skylines II\AutoDistrictNameStations.coc ```
